tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The dental consulting and explanation was excellent from the doctor.

Dr handed my son very good by speaking things which my son likes and treatment was done without any much uncomfortable and without cry. The kid is was very happy with the treatment.

We are very much satisfied with the care and the treatment they had given to my kid. My kid felt most comfortable that they gave the clarity of the treatment before and after the complete process. Dr is very friendly and excellently analysing the problem. I would definitely recommend the clinic to my friends and relatives. Extremely great support even after treatment.Timely replies to any queries raised even after treatment!!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable time and feedback it means a lot sir........

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr.Rajith and Dr.Sruthi,

It’s evident that you prioritize the well-being and comfort of your patients, creating a patient-centered environment that fosters trust.
I’ve been impressed by your attention to detail in every aspect of dental procedures, ensuring precision and quality in your work.
Your friendly and approachable demeanor makes dental visits more pleasant, and it’s refreshing to have a dentist who genuinely cares about their patients.
The positive atmosphere in your dental practice reflects your commitment to creating a welcoming and supportive space for patients.
Your dedication to staying updated with the latest advancements in dentistry is commendable, and it instills confidence in the quality of care you provide.
I feel confident in your care and appreciate the peace of mind that comes with having a dentist as skilled and dedicated.
Thank you once again for your outstanding contributions to dental health, and I look forward to continuing my dental care under your expertise to have a confident smile 🤓
reply_text: THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR VALUABLE FEEDBACK MAM ......

MP Rajan IAS (Rtd) & Shamsa Rajan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1) understands the root cause of the issue very well 
2) Listens to patients dental problems and provides exact solution .
3)  will not suggest any unnecessary treatment . Doctor also tries to protect the existing tooth . I've seen many dentists  just extract tooth for small issues rather than trying to protect it . 
4) Really felt we are in safe hands during the treatment .
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE FEEDBACK SIR .....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
It was great. He did have great expertise at the task. I mean my tooth wasn't even visible at the first place to be extracted, but with the skill he pluked, really appreciable.
Best part was he was keeping me in loop with what he was about to do next, that way I was prepared before hand regarding what to exepect next. The way he made me feel calm and comfortable was again a plus point for me to sustain through the process. So yes, definitely a 10/10 for the doctor. But the cost did feel pricey, as I was informed it to be lesser, the previous time I visited.
reply_text: thank you for your valuable feedback mam....

review: I was suffering from toothache since one month and the pain used to increase at night time. I consulted Dr. Rajith regarding this matter and he adviced me to do Root Canal treatment as my teeth were infected and that's why I was having this much pain. Like you all I too had many myths about RCT in my mind that it will be painful and long procedure. Trust my words...you are safe in the hands of an experienced RCT specialist like Dr.Rajith and I didn't feel any pain at all and the treatment finished sooner than what I expected. Thanks to Rootz Dental care and Implant centre and all friendly doctors and employees over there...I had a good experience...Thank you to make me smile again without pain...😊
reply_text: Thank you very much for your valuable time and consideration to give such a motivational feedback.  this  will give us energy to do more and more ......
